liquidityContent: Liquidity providers earn a 0.3% fee on all trades proportional to their share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
connectHint: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
noLiquidityHint: Don’t see a pool you joined?
hint1: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
hint2: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
hint5: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
content1: You are the first provider of this liquidity. The added currency ratio will directly affect the price of the liquidity pool. Please anticipate the relevant risks in advance.
hint6: By adding liquidity you'll earn 0.3% of all trades on this pair proportional to your share of the pool.Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
hint7: Find a token by searching for its name or symbol or by pasting its address below.

hint12: A portion of each trade (0.30%) goes to liquidity providers as a protocol incentive.
hint13: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.

This tool will safely migrate your V1 li: This tool will safely migrate your V1 liquidity to V2 with minimal price risk. The process is completely trustless thanks to the
hint21: It's best to deposit liquidity into Uniswap V2 at a price you believe is correct. If the V2 price seems incorrect, you can either make a swap to move the price or wait for someone else to do so.
hint22: You are the first liquidity provider for this pair on Uniswap V2. Your liquidity will be migrated at the current V1 price. Your transaction cost also includes the gas to create the pool.
hint23: Your Uniswap V1 {{symbol}}/HT liquidity will become Uniswap V2 {{symbol}}/HT liquidity.
hint24: Migrate your liquidity tokens from Uniswap V1 to Uniswap V2.
hint25: Because Uniswap V2 uses WHT under the hood, your Uniswap V1 WHT/HT liquidity cannot be migrated. You may want to remove your liquidity instead.
hint26: For each pool shown below, click migrate to remove your liquidity from Uniswap V1 and deposit it into Uniswap V2.
hint27: Connect to a wallet to view your V1 liquidity.
hint28: Enter a token address to find liquidity

hint31: This swap has a price impact of at least {{amount}}%. Please type the word 'confirm' to continue with this swap.
hint32: This swap has a price impact of at least {{amount}}%. Please confirm that you would like to continue with this swap.
hint33: Token lists are an open specification for lists of ERC20 tokens. You can use any token list by entering its URL below. Beware that third party token lists can contain fake or malicious ERC20 tokens.
hint34: Enter an address to trigger a UNI claim. If the address has any claimable UNI it will be sent to them on submission.

hint37: As a member of the Uniswap community you may claim UNI to be used for voting and governance.

hint43: UNI tokens represent voting shares in Uniswap governance. You can vote on each proposal yourself or delegate your votes to a third party.
